tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DiscriminationCases (
 case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 case_date DATE,
 case_details TEXT,
 case_location VARCHAR(255),
 discrimination_type VARCHAR(50),
 complainant_name VARCHAR(100),
 allegations TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE DiscriminationCases (
  case_id INT,
  case_date DATE,
  case_description TEXT,
  primary_race VARCHAR(50),
  primary_gender VARCHAR(10),
  PRIMARY KEY (case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DiscriminationReports (
  report_id INT,
  report_date DATE,
  case_id INT,
  reporter_name VARCHAR(100),
  report_description TEXT,
  PRIMARY KEY (report_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES DiscriminationCases (case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE RightsViolationStats (
  violation_id INT,
  violation_type VARCHAR(50),
  violation_date DATE,
  num_violations INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (violation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Victims (
    victim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id INT,
    victim_name TEXT,
    victim_age INT,
    gender TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES Discrimination_Cases(case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Perpetrators (
    perpetrator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id INT,
    perpetrator_name TEXT,
    perpetrator_details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES Discrimination_Cases(case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id INT,
    reporter_name TEXT,
    report_date DATE,
    report_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES Discrimination_Cases(case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE discrimination_cases (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_name VARCHAR(100),
    case_description TEXT,
    reported_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE case_parties (
    party_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    party_name VARCHAR(150),
    party_type VARCHAR(50),
    case_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES discrimination_cases(case_id)
)

CREATE TABLE case_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(150),
    country VARCHAR(50),
    case_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES discrimination_cases(case_id)
)

CREATE TABLE case_outcomes (
    outcome_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    outcome_description TEXT,
    case_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES discrimination_cases(case_id)
)

CREATE TABLE case_statistics (
    statistic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    statistic_name VARCHAR(100),
    statistic_value INT,
    case_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES discrimination_cases(case_id)
)
